newsitem.title: EL SALVADOR: Toxic gas cloud kills three in El Salvador.
newsitem.headline: Toxic gas cloud kills three in El Salvador.

text.p: A toxic gas cloud released by accident at a detergent factory in western El Salvador killed at least three people and injured more on Monday, police said.
A truck ran into a chemical tank at the factory, releasing the cloud that killed the driver and two minors, police said.
"A large number of people have arrived. We are unable to look after them all," said an employee at the San Juan de Dios de Sonsonate hospital, about 40 miles (65 km) from the capital.
The Red Cross said it was sending reinforcements to help aid the victims. Police said they were urging nearby residents to evacuate.
